SENT.plain: Six patients with congenital muscular dystrophy examined from January, 1990 to January, 1993 are presented
Vastus lateralis muscle biopsies were performed on all patients
Five of 6 patients had "pure" congenital muscular dystrophy without evidence of central nervous system disease
Of these 5 patients, 2 had mild courses, 2 moderate, and 1 severe
Possible correlation between severity of muscle pathology and severity of clinical course in "pure" congenital muscular dystrophy patients is discussed
